content.title: Intro
content.content: -nwe is Quenya suffix that has two meanings.

content.title: -nwe1
content.content: It is equivalent to the English suffix -ness. This can be seen in Manwe ("blessedness") and Voronwe ("steadfastness").[1]

content.title: -nwe2
content.content: It is a dual exclusive pronoun suffix meaning "we, both of us".[2] This can be seen in ósanwe (lit. "thinking together") and inwe ("ourselves").[3]
